br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.bc

Interface PinpadCallbacks


  • public PinpadCallbacks

    Callbacks to notify payment application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PinpadCallbacks.Companion 
      static class  PinpadCallbacks.MenuItem 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CARD_BLOCKED
      Card is blocked
      static PinpadCallbacks.Companion Companion 
      static int INSERT_SWIPE_CARD
      Ask user to insert or swipe a card
      static int INVALID_APP
      User chose an invalid application
      static int PIN_BLOCKED
      PIN is blocked
      static int PIN_LAST_TRY
      The next PIN entry will be the last before blocking it
      static int PIN_STARTING
      Indicate that a PIN capture screen is about to be shown. Should be used for ONLINE PIN
      static int PIN_STARTING_S
      Indicate that a PIN OFFLINE capture screen is about to be shown, with pin remaining tries as parameter.
      static int PIN_VERIFIED
      PIN has been successfully verified
      static int PROCESSING
      Display a progress indicator, like a loading icon
      static int REMOVE_CARD
      Ask user to remove card
      static int SECOND_TAP
      Message for a second tap on Contactless flow
      static int SELECT
      Event for AID selection menu
      static int SELECTED_S
      The application whose label is given in parameter has been selected
      static int TAP_INSERT_SWIPE_CARD
      Ask user to tap, insert or swipe a card, meaning that contactless is enabled
      static int TEXT_S
      Directly display the contents of parameter
      static int UPDATING_RECORD
      Signal for each TLR that is being processed
      static int UPDATING_TABLES
      Signal with TLI has been processed
      static int WRONG_PIN_S
      User entered with a wrong PIN, parameter has the number of attempts left as a decimal string

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAbort()
      This method is called when the async command is aborted by the Pinpad object.

      Notify the checkout that an event happened during the current operation. This is a non-blocking operation just to inform the user of progress from Pinpad.

      int onShowPinEntry(java.lang.String message, long amount, int digits)

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        int onEvent(int eventId,
            @NotNull
            java.lang.String eventParam)

        Notify the checkout that an event happened during the current operation. This is a non-blocking operation just to inform the user of progress from Pinpad.

        Parameters:
        eventId - The event ID
        eventParam - If the message ID includes a trailing "_S" indicator, it receives an extra status parameter, which is given in string form here

      • onShowPinEntry

        int onShowPinEntry(@NotNull
                   java.lang.String message,
                   long amount,
                   int digits)

      • onAbort

        void onAbort()

        This method is called when the async command is aborted by the Pinpad object.
